definition: to turn back/to backtrack/(fig.) to revert to the former way of doing things
to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
to curve/to return/to revolve
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
variant of 迴|回[hui2]
suffix for nouns
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Lu
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也许走得慢点儿，可我绝不会走回头路。

sentences.english: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 我走的不快，但绝不走回头路。

sentences.english: Yet now I was going back.
sentences.chinese: 然而我开始走回头路了。

sentences.english: Once you start, don't look back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦开始流程后，就不要走回头路。

sentences.english: And then we walked down and visited the swan lake and grass lake.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们再走回头路，参观了天鹅海和芳草海。

sentences.english: Consequently, we reached a situation where it's quite impossible to come back.
sentences.chinese: 自然的，以我们现在的形势不能再走回头路了。

sentences.english: I paid the fee in one lump sum and I told myself, "No turning back".
sentences.chinese: 我付了费，一笔过，我告诉自己，“不会走回头路”。

sentences.english: You have to look forward, because life will not go back.
sentences.chinese: 你得朝前看，因为生命不会走回头路。

sentences.english: Gorbachev’s reforms either were ignored or they were enacted with perverse consequences.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫的改革要么被忽略，要么走回头路。

sentences.english: Never look back unless you want to go that way.
sentences.chinese: 不要回头望，除非想走回头路。

sentences.english: It is a forward only reader, meaning that you can't go backwards.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个只转发器，这意味着你不能走回头路。

sentences.english: Move on, for life is not meant to be traveled backwards.
sentences.chinese: 要往前走，因为生命不会走回头路。

definition: the road back to where one came from
old road/familiar way/beaten track/conventional behavior
to stick to one's ways/to cling to one's course
pinyin: yi1 tiao2 dao4 zou3 dao4 hei1

definition: to go the wrong way/to take the wrong (road, exit etc)
fork in the road
this road is blocked/fig. This method does not work./Doing this is no good.
meandering and circuitous (idiom); complicated developments that never get anywhere/going around in circles
to turn back
dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
correct line (i.e. the party line)
to follow the track of an overturned cart/to repeat a disastrous policy

lit. once you've shot the arrow, there's no getting it back (idiom)/fig. once you started sth, there's no turning back/to have to finish what one started/to be determined to reach one's goals in spite of setbacks
pinyin: kai1 gong1 mei2 you3 hui2 tou2 jian4

definition: to stand still without advancing (idiom); to hesitate and hold back
winding road/roundabout route/detour/(fig.) wrong way (of doing sth)
nowhere to go/at the end of one's tether
to take an indirect route/to waste one's time by using an inappropriate method
